mapper.select: select id,password from tsys_user where username = #{username} limit 1

select f.uid id,fm.uid m_id from tsys_user_role ur left join tsys_role_function_module rfm on ur.role_id = rfm.role_id left join tsys_function_module fm on fm.id = rfm.function_module_id left join tsys_function f on f.id = fm.function_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and f.is_show = 1
